requestParams.name: idempotent_no
requestParams.desc: 幂等单号(请求唯一标识)

requestParams.name: is_need_pd
requestParams.desc: 是否将库存盘点成0，默认false不盘点

requestParams.name: retail_source
requestParams.desc: 请求来源（需调用方自定义标识：OPEN_XXXX）

children.name: amount
children.desc: 实际入库数量（千倍）非空

children.name: return_amount
children.desc: 退货数量（千倍）非空 returnAmount= amount + lossAmount

children.name: source_kdt_id
children.desc: 商品所属kdtId 连锁版退货入库必填
